author: cmpilato
msg: Hide unreadable directory children in mod_dav_svn's GET response.
Subversion has always publicly disclaimed that certain aspects of the
system will leak the name of unreadable files or subdirectories, but
not their contents.  But when its easy to keep that information out of
view, we might as well do so.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/dav_svn.h,
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/authz.c
(dav_svn__allow_read_resource): Was dav_svn__allow_read().  Fix the
docstring.  Callers updated to track the new function name.
(dav_svn__allow_read): Was authz.c:allow_read().  Fix the docstring.
Callers updated to track the new function name.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/repos.c
(deliver): Check for read permission on the dirents of versioned
directories returned for display in HTML or XML, hiding those for
which the user has no read permission.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/lock.c,
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/liveprops.c
Updated calls to renamed functions.

author: elecharny
msg: reverted the trunk to 2.0.0-RC2-SNAPSHOT, as the vote for 2.0.0 has been cancelled. Fixed the distribution to generate 2 packages, one for the bin, one for the src. Fixed the problem with the build when -Pserial is not used : it now builds again. The serial module is not anymore included into the dist package
